name: Party Charades
description:
Party Charades is a fun and hilarious new word guessing game that you can play with your friends and family. It is the ultimate party app!

Place your phone on forehead and try to guess the words from hints and clues your friends give you.

Tilt your phone down when you guess correctly, and up to pass.

Chose among 23 fun packed categories from naming Hollywood stars, to singing, to impersonation of famous people.

Your friends will sing, dance, act, impersonate or talk in silly accents to give you clues to guess the word. All this action will be recorded by the phone’s front camera.

Save or Share funny and hilarious videos with your Facebook friends.

***** FEATURES *****
- 23 fun packed categories (Movies, Foods, Songs, Celebrities and much more)
- Save or share videos with friends
- Share videos on Facebook
